t: 2021-June-22 -- A foreign seller has hijacked my Amazon ...
s: Well, sometime in May, Amazon seller "Amvoom", from Shenzen China, trademarked the word "Amvoom". t: Amazon won't help Klein bottle seller after another company hijacks his product listing with a blackhead remover - Boing Boing
s: June 30, 2021 - Well, sometime in May, Amazon seller "Amvoom", from Shenzen China, trademarked the word "Amvoom". On June 22nd, they used Amazon's Brand Registry to re-brand my listing on Amazon (replacing my brand, "Acme Klein Bottle" with "Amvoom") They could do this because Amazon's Brand Registry only ...

t: What is the whole story of Amazon's nearly 200 favorable reviews being hijacked by a mysterious Chinese vendor? - GIGAZINE
s: Stall investigated the brand Amvoom, it was found that Amvoom is a brand that develops acne removers and was registered as a trademark in Shenzhen, China in May 2021. It was also revealed that Amvoom's acne remover had taken over the favorable reviews that Stall's 'Klein Bottle' had earned.
